keyMoments.title: Luffy Debuts Red Hawk Against Hody
keyMoments.description: Luffy unleashes his new Red Hawk technique, demonstrating the Straw Hats' overwhelming power post-timeskip.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's growth and their ability to protect Fish-Man Island from the New Fish-Man Pirates.

keyMoments.title: Multiple Straw Hats Prepare Final Attacks
keyMoments.description: Franky, Sanji, Jinbe, and Zoro prepare to finish their respective opponents, showing coordinated crew strength.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the crew working in parallel to defeat the New Fish-Man Pirates.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Guards Announce Hody's Defeat
keyMoments.description: After Red Hawk, guards announce Hody's defeat and lower-ranked members attempt to flee.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's morale breaking as their captain appears defeated.

keyMoments.title: Zeo Attacks Deserters
keyMoments.description: Officer Zeo stops fleeing crew members and demands they die for their grudge, showing the crew's fanatical ideology.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the extremist nature of the New Fish-Man Pirates and their willingness to sacrifice their own.

jollyRoger.description: A shark skull with crossed tridents
